* BrightBlade snarled and dodged out of the way as Shredder fires at her but 
get's the hit in the left shoulder, she yells in surprise and falls on her 
back. Just as he back touches the ground her head strikes a rock and she's 
knocked half unconscious, BrightBlade moaned as a head ache spread from the 
back of her head to behind her optics.
She looks up at the sky, she couldn't fail Hell Beast...bot her Lord!
BrightBlade sat up and rubbed her temples as she looked off to the side, her 
gun was now out of reach...oh no!
She turns and looks at Shredder, she growls deeply as she rises to one 
knee...*

" You won't take me traitor, not alive!!"
